definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
hegemon/tyrant/lord/feudal chief/to rule by force/to usurp/(in modern advertising) master

sentences.english: The RTS (real time strategy) video game genre has been defined by this game.
sentences.chinese: 星際爭霸是即時戰略遊戲的代表。

sentences.english: Macro and Micro in Starcraft was an important factor of the game.
sentences.chinese: 星際爭霸當中的宏操與微操都非常重要。

sentences.english: He wanted to be Captain Kirk in Star Trek.
sentences.chinese: 他想要成爲星際爭霸戰裏的寇克艦長。

sentences.english: StarCraft has the best macro style of any RTS ever made.
sentences.chinese: 星際爭霸較其他RTS遊戲有着最好的宏機制。

sentences.english: TVGB: Great news if you love the StarCraft mythos and comic books.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的消息如果您喜歡星際爭霸神話和漫畫書。

definition: to start the servers (for an online game, typically after the system has been shut down for maintenance, upgrade etc)
Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
